body_html: Microbenchmark 3 (64 x 2408) is much slower for me after this PR (.54 s vs .40 s before), because 3 memcopies are now done, one in each addmm (as opposed to 2 before). Even those 2 should not be needed, and at some point were not needed, I'll have to see how and why they appeared.

body: Microbenchmark 3 (64 x 2408) is much slower for me after this PR (.54 s vs .40 s before), because 3 memcopies are now done, one in each addmm (as opposed to 2 before). Even those 2 should not be needed, and at some point were not needed, I'll have to see how and why they appeared.
